ygData.subject: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: If u where the person who was going to play with me and show me the ropes on Monday (JUNE 5th, My B-day). I might and i might not get Everquest. My parents are
ygData.messageBody:
If u where the person who was going to play with
me and show me the ropes on Monday (JUNE 5th, My
B-day). I might and i might not get Everquest. My parents
are denying the fact that they are going too get me
something for my b-day sinse they spent 350 on repairs too
my dirt bike. They said they might get me something
though. I don't know if their pullin my leg or telling
the truth. But since i have too work Monday night I
will get my gift Sunday. Soo Just be ready and on the
net with your messanger on and me in it on Sunday
night around 6 P.M. central time.
